info.title: BetterContact API
info.description: The official BetterContact API to enrich your contacts list and find leads

post.description: Create a new lead finder request to find people working in specific companies

requestBody.description: Filters and parameters for lead finding

get.description: Retrieve the results for a specific request ID (works for both enrichment and lead finder requests)
Retrieve the results for a specific request ID

data.description: Array of leads to enrich. Minimum: 1 lead. Maximum: 100 leads.

company.description: Company name of the contact (not required if company domain is provided).

company_domain.description: Company domain of the contact (required if company name not provided).

linkedin_url.description: Linkedin profile url of the contact (public url is required - recommended if phone number enrichment is requested).

custom_fields.description: Can be any relevant data you want to be back in the response like CRM id or unique identifier. The following data (uuid, list_name) is just an example

enrich_email_address.description: If true, work email address of the contact will be enriched.

enrich_phone_number.description: If true, direct phone number of the contact will be enriched.

webhook.description: You can provide a webhook URL where results will be pushed once enrichment is done.

process_flow.description: Add the process flow ID to use for your enrichment, if subscribed to the process flow add-on.

max_leads.description: Maximum number of leads to return

webhook.description: Optional URL to receive results automatically

exact_match.description: When enabled, only exact job title matches are returned

include.description: Seniority levels that must match. Possible values: senior, entry, manager, mid-level, director, c_suite, owner, intern, founder, head, vp, partner

exclude.description: Seniority levels that must NOT match. Possible values: senior, entry, manager, mid-level, director, c_suite, owner, intern, founder, head, vp, partner
Company domains that must NOT match (e.g. 'google.com', 'microsoft.com')

enum: transportation, logistics, supply chain and storage
venture capital and private equity principals

include.description: Company industries that must match. Must be exact values from the predefined list.

enum: transportation, logistics, supply chain and storage
venture capital and private equity principals

exclude.description: Company industries that must NOT match. Must be exact values from the predefined list.

include.description: Lead departments that must match. Must be exact values from the predefined list.

exclude.description: Lead departments that must NOT match. Must be exact values from the predefined list.

include.description: Lead functions that must match. Must be exact values from the predefined list.

exclude.description: Lead functions that must NOT match. Must be exact values from the predefined list.

contact_email_address_status.description: Available statuses: deliverable, catch_all_safe, catch_all_not_safe, undeliverable

contact_headline.example: Find emails and phones with bettercontact waterfall enrichment

company_description.example: Bettercontact aggregates 20+ premium contact data providers such as people data labs, rocketreach, and datagma into one subscription.
